name: In the Garden of Dandelions
description:
Do you sometimes get that feeling of wanting to escape everyday life for a bit? “In the Garden of Dandelions” takes you on a journey into a world full of magic, wishes and dreams. Fly like a dandelion in the wind and enjoy some relaxing moments!

Experience the story of Anna, a seamstress who lives in the valley of windmills. In this valley, the Perfect Machines ensure a content life. But can a perfect life also be happy? Help Anna discover the hidden power of the heart’s desires.

“In the Garden of Dandelions” is based on the eponymous best-selling picture book by Noelia Blanco and Valeria Docampo which was received favourably in the press:
+ “A magically beautiful story about dreaming and wishing.” (FAZ.net)
+ “Full of poetry and emotions.” (Münchner Merkur)
+ “A wonderfully illustrated story about the magic of imperfection and longing.” (FOCUS Spezial)

Here’s what’s waiting for in the app:
+ Be inspired by the heart-warming, cinematic story about the power of dreams and wishes
+ Fly and collect as many dandelions as possible in order to bring the wind back to the Valley of Windmills
+ Sink into the flow of the gameplay – it’s easy to get the hang of and becomes more challenging over time
+ Master risky flight manoeuvres like loopings and slow down your flight to catch even more dandelions – all with the touch of one finger
+ Listen to the enchanting story in German, English and French
+ Dream along to music that is perfectly harmonised with the game
+ Play in “endless mode“ and conquer the global high scores
+ Enjoy limitless access to the integrated picture book film with illustrations by Valeria Docampo

Download the app now and start dreaming!

GLOBAL LEADERBOARD
"In the Garden of Dandelions" comes with a global leaderboard to compare your score to other players around the world. To activate it, go to the parental controls in the main menu (or have your parents do it) and turn on the global highscore board. Have fun!

HELP
We want you to enjoy the story of Anna and the Birdman without restrictions. We are therefore happy to be there for you if, despite all our efforts, technical problems should arise. Please send us an email to help@mixtvision.de. Thank you!

ADULTS
Dear parents, Mixtvision makes high-quality apps that you can easily discover, read and play with your children. We also deliberately refrain from displaying ads and in-app purchases in our app “In the Garden of Dandelions”. If you enjoy the stories we share with our apps, we would be very pleased to receive a positive review here in the App Store. Thank you!

If you are curious about what else we do, then please visit us at the App Store or at www.mixtvision.de/en.
